name: Repg
description:
YO we made a new game, if u didn't know we with my friend (The Gooseyes) just teamed up and created "Pixel Brotherhood".

He drawed all the sprites and also he made one track for the game (first island theme).
I programmed, made other music & sfx. Aslo, I wrote a story 4 da game.

Our discord group: https://discord.gg/YZh4jYK
